title: Wearing Scars - A Thousand Words 2015 ak
description:
Featuring former Mutiny Within frontman Chris Clancy as well as former Sacred Mother Tongue guitarist Andy James, there was always going to be a little bit of hype surrounding their new band Wearing Scars. 
Their debut song, Ã¢â‚¬ËœBecome NumbÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ , was released back in February and with their debut album, A Thousand Words, ready to be released on July 24th, it seems that this new rock/metal outfit have done a good job at putting their past behind them.

The album is filled with heavy guitar driven tracks and an incredibly strong vocal performance from Chris Clancy. 
His capabilities as a rock vocalist really stand out throughout the album; from the soothing, ballad-esque styles of Ã¢â‚¬ËœGone ForeverÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ to the more opened up vocals of Ã¢â‚¬ËœI Could Never SayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. 
His voice is definitely one that belongs in a hard rock band such as this one but is a voice that possesses certain subtleties that help distinguish it from other typical rock vocals.


Genre: Alt. Metal / Melodic Metalcore / Modern Metal
Country: UK
Quality: 320 kbps
